string.text: Basic Settings
Enable Mod
Whether to enable IronBlood Siege - Note: Do not enable or disable during battle, adjust before entering the scene
Enable When Player is Attacker
Whether to enable iron will effect when player is on the attacking side
Enable Attack Gates
When there is no battering ram or the battering ram is destroyed, middle lane formations will attack the gates
Enable Outer Gate Damage Enhance
Damage multiplier for soldiers attacking outer gates with weapons
Outer Gate Damage Multiplier
Multiplier for damage dealt to outer gates. Default: 2.0
Casualties as a percentage of total troops
When the number of casualties reaches this ratio of the total number of troops, the Buff effect disappears.. Default: 70
Buff Settings
Show Casualty Message
Whether to display messages showing attacker force remaining and casualty rate
